title: Morning Minute: MetaMask Parent Consensys Files for IPO
contentSnippet: Just a day after rolling out its MetaMask rewards program, which now begs the question—how will they balance an IPO and a token launch?

title: Uphold relaunches XRP rewards debit card in US
contentSnippet: The company's move follows Uphold in March reinstating staking rewards for U.S. customers across 19 different digital assets.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Tests $110K as Traders ‘Sell the News’ on Fed Cut, U.S.-China Deal
contentSnippet: Bitcoin slid to its $110,000 support as the broader crypto market shed $80 billion following the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cut and a new U.S.-China trade agreement.

title: Circle’s USDC Overtakes Tether's USDT in Onchain Activity as Regulation Drives Shift: JPMorgan
contentSnippet: USDC leapfrogged USDT in onchain activity as regulatory clarity pushes investors toward transparent and compliant stablecoins.

title: Ethereum US Spot Demand Slips Amid Crypto Market Pressure
contentSnippet: U.S. Ethereum demand cools as ETF inflows stall, but experts see this as a rotation, not a reversal, ahead of a utility-driven cycle.

title: Plasma’s XPL Token Crashes 80% as Hype Fades Amid Woeful Debut
contentSnippet: Once billed as the “blockchain for stablecoins,” Plasma’s XPL token has plunged from its $1.67 peak to $0.31 amid low network activity and waning sentiment

title: Market Stumbles on Fed Caution as Options Expiry Looms: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 30, 2025

title: DeFi Set to Challenge TradFi With $2T in Tokenized Assets by 2028: Standard Chartered
contentSnippet: The bank said the 2025 stablecoin boom is fueling a self-sustaining wave of DeFi growth, and it forecasted $2 trillion in tokenized real-world assets by 2028.

title: Grayscale spot Solana ETF sees $1.4M inflows on debut as over $500M exits Bitcoin and Ethereum funds
contentSnippet: Grayscale's new U.S. spot Solana ETF, GSOL, registered $1.4 million in net inflows on its Oct. 29 trading debut.

title: TeraWulf upsizes private offering to $900 million to fund Texas data center expansion
contentSnippet: TeraWulf upsizes and prices a $900 million zero-coupon convertible due 2032 to fund a Texas data center build.

title: Australia's AUSTRAC Fines Cryptolink as Part of Crypto ATM Crackdown
contentSnippet: AUSTRAC has fined Cryptolink 56,340 Australian dollars ($37,000) after identifying "weaknesses" in the company's AML/CTF compliance.

title: Australian Police Use 'Crypto Safe Cracker' to Access $6M Stash
contentSnippet: The AFP Commissioner revealed how one analyst's intuition unlocked millions in crypto which a suspect tried to hide behind manipulated code.

title: Analysis: Prediction Market Bettors Miscalculated Dutch Election Results
contentSnippet: Both Polymarket and Kalshi traders ignored late polls showing D66 gaining ground, keeping Geert Wilders’ PVV priced as a sure thing until exit polls forced a repricing that erased millions in misplace

title: This Bitcoin Market Dynamic Commands Attention as Prices Surge Past $110K Ahead of $13B Options Expiry
contentSnippet: Key market dynamic points to potential for heightened market volatility ahead of Friday's options expiry.

title: Bitcoin tops $111,300 as Trump says China trade deal coming ‘pretty soon’
contentSnippet: Trump reportedly said that he would cut reciprocal tariffs from 20% to 10%, and that he settled rare earth-related issues with China.

title: Crypto Traders Take On $800M Liquidations as Fed’s Caution Sparks ‘Sell-the-News’ Reversal
contentSnippet: Large clusters of long liquidations can signal capitulation and potential short-term bottoms, while heavy short wipeouts may precede local tops as momentum flips.

title: XRP Rejects $2.67 Breakout in Risk of Deeper Pullback as Fed Cuts Cause Bitcoin Slide
contentSnippet: XRP slid from $2.63 to $2.59 after a failed breakout above the $2.67 zone, with trading volume spiking to roughly 392.6 million tokens—about 658% above its recent average—during the rejection.

title: Chinese Man Arrested in Bangkok Over Alleged $14M Crypto Ponzi Scheme
contentSnippet: Thai police discovered an illegal firearm during the raid as they work to extradite the suspect back to China for trial.

title: Gold on a Steady Decline, Is it Bitcoin's Time to Shine?
contentSnippet: As gold cools, experts see a potential Bitcoin catch-up trade, but warn a major capital rotation is unlikely due to different investor bases.

title: Hong Kong’s top regulator flags digital asset treasury risks: report
contentSnippet: SFC Chair Kelvin Wong Tin-yau said the regulator will step up investor education efforts on DATs and their risks.

title: KRWQ launches as first Korean won stablecoin on Base
contentSnippet: KRWQ is not yet offered to South Korean residents, as local regulations on stablecoin are under development.

title: Binance.US denies political motive in listing Trump-linked USD1 stablecoin
contentSnippet: Binance.US responded to criticism from Sen. Chris Murphy, who alleged its USD1 listing was payback following Trump's pardon of CZ.

title: Bitchat Tops Jamaica App Charts as Hurricane Melissa Cuts Connectivity
contentSnippet: Bitchat uses Bluetooth mesh networking for offline communication, turning each phone into a node that relays messages to nearby devices.

title: Mastercard in Talks to Acquire Stablecoin Tech Firm Zerohash for Around $2 Billion: Fortune
contentSnippet: The potential deal follows reports earlier this month that the credit card giant and Coinbase were each in late-stage talks to acquire stablecoin startup BVNK.

title: IBM’s Quantum ‘Cat’ Roars: 120-Qubit Breakthrough Pushes Bitcoin’s Encryption Risk Closer
contentSnippet: IBM’s new 120-qubit experiment marks a leap forward, advancing technology that could one day crack Bitcoin’s encryption.

title: Why $71 Billion Bitcoin Behemoth Strategy Is Still Betting on BTC Hitting $150K This Year
contentSnippet: Strategy founder Michael Saylor thinks Bitcoin will grind its way to $150,000 this year, despite the dip from its recent all-time high.

title: MetaMask Maker Consensys Plans IPO With JPMorgan, Goldman: Axios
contentSnippet: Consensys, the Ethereum software firm behind MetaMask, has reportedly hired JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs to prepare for a potential IPO

title: MetaMask parent Consensys pursues IPO with JPMorgan and Goldman: Axios
contentSnippet: Consensys plans to follow in the footsteps of other crypto firms like Circle and Bullish and launch an initial public offering.

title: ‘Huge number’: Bitwise’s Solana ETF crosses $70 million in volume on second day
contentSnippet: The Bitwise Solana Staking ETF's $56 million day-one volume was the most among nearly 850 ETF launches this year.

title: Mastercard to acquire crypto infrastructure startup Zerohash in deal worth up to $2 billion: Fortune
contentSnippet: The deal would extend Mastercard’s crypto reach from payments into the core infrastructure powering stablecoins and tokenization.
